subject: Beneficiary,
body:
Beneficiary,
Your payment file is on my table now and I just want to assist you and make sure you receive your fund using my system and you will not spend a dime until you confirm your money safe and sound.
Meanwhile this is to officially inform you that I have written to you before without getting respond back from you and I believe that our previous mail did not get to you therefore I write you again.
You are going to travel to Brazil and sign the necessary back up papers and from there,you move down to Hong Kong and get paid there.
This is a code that the President use to pay his contractor friends making them happy and comfortable.I will inlist your name among s them so that my government will pay for your flight ticket to Brazil and to Hong Kong and also back to your country.
We shall also provide and forward to you along  the hotel reservations in Brazil and Hong Kong.All these you will receive and confirm before you leave your country for Brazil.We have other payment centers and if I confirm,I will let you know if you care.
As you arrive Brazil,before you sign,you will be given a BTA traveling allowance of $1000 which you will be making use of until you leave for Hong Kong.
Note that you have to give me upon conclusion 10% of the total fund for my giving you this contact as you are not spending a dime in this project but note that it is 100% risk free and must be strictly kept confidential because of the nature of my job in the country.
I have all the legal back up documents that will assist you to scale through in this process and will forward them to you as we move along.
If it interest you,kindly acknowledge receipt of this mail and please furnish me with the below information's.
1.Your real names and address:
2.Your telephone number and fax:
3.Your age/Occupation:
4:
Your international passport
:
All these I will use and secure fresh payment approvals in your names and favor through this mode payment so that it will be easy for you.
Thank you for your understanding.
Attach is my staff id card for your perusal.
You are free to ask me questions on areas that confuse you so that I can put you through.
Acknowledge receipt of this email please.
 Thank you.
Faithfully,
Dr. Anthony Okafor
International telex Director

subject: Re: Beneficiary,
body:
Hello Dr. Anthony Okafor,

Thank you for reaching out to me and providing such detailed information about this opportunity. It sounds like an interesting process, but I must admit, I'm a bit confused about some parts of it.

Could you please explain more about the nature of these backup papers that need to be signed in Brazil? Also, why is it necessary to travel all the way to Hong Kong to receive the payment?

You mentioned a code used by the President for paying contractor friends. Could you elaborate on how this works and how my name would be enlisted among them?

I'm also curious about the BTA traveling allowance. How much is it and what exactly can it be used for?

Lastly, you mentioned that there are other payment centers. Where are these located and could they possibly provide a more convenient option for me?

I appreciate your patience in answering my questions. Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
David

subject: Re[2]: Beneficiary,
body:
Dear David.

I am in receipt of your mail and contents noted.
The two papers you are to sign is the fund release order and benevolent deed agreement which authenticate you as the rightful beneficiary of the funds.

The need for traveling is to control corruption and also because the government is sponsoring you without knowing since is group sponsor.

By code it means a way the way the president help and pay his contractors friends sponsoring them in all payment.

As an insider I will fix in your name among others and the government will sponsor you by paying your flight ticket in all and your hotel fees also.As soon as you arrive Brazil,the committee there will give you a BTA pocket money of say $1000 which will be serving for your feeding and others.
Presently other payment centers have closed leaving just Brazil and Hong Kong is in operation now and no other.

Kindly forward to me the requested so that i will use them and secure fresh application to this in your name legally and forward to you for your perusals .
I wait for your mail please

Dr.Anthony Okafor.

Sent from App for Gmail

Friday, February 9, 2024, 3:46 AM +0100 from lk50193@freedomgkj<lk50193@***.com>:

subject: Re: Re[2]: Beneficiary,
body:
Hello Okafor,

Thank you for your detailed explanation. I'm quite intrigued by the process you've outlined, especially the part about the government sponsoring me without knowing. That's a fascinating concept!

I understand that I need to sign two papers - the fund release order and benevolent deed agreement. Could you please elaborate more on what these documents entail? What are my responsibilities and rights under these agreements?

Also, you mentioned that only Brazil and Hong Kong payment centers are operational now. Why is that so? And why were other centers closed?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
David

subject: Re: Re[2]: Beneficiary,
body:

The idea of traveling sounds exciting, especially since it's sponsored by the government. However, I'm a bit confused about how this sponsorship works. Could you please explain more about this "code" system? How does the president choose who to sponsor?

Also, could you tell me more about these payment centers in Brazil and Hong Kong? Why have others closed down? 

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.
